Sentencas: Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-x (CGO) was found to have useful methane steam reforming activity at solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) operating temperatures producing H-2, CO and some CO2.
Titulo: Catalytic steam reforming of methane over Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-x

Sentencas: The turnover frequency for steam reforming at 900 degreesC and activation energy (153 +/- 10 kJ mol(-1)) are approximately equal to those for reaction between CGO and dry methane.
Titulo: Catalytic steam reforming of methane over Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-x

Sentencas: This is consistent with a reaction mechanism controlled by the slow reaction of methane with oxygen in CGO and a facile reaction between steam and CGO to replenish the oxygen.
Titulo: Catalytic steam reforming of methane over Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-x

Sentencas: The addition of hydrogen to the inlet stream inhibited the reforming rate.
Titulo: Catalytic steam reforming of methane over Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-x

Sentencas: CGO was found to be extremely resistant to carbon deposition in steam reforming conditions.
Titulo: Catalytic steam reforming of methane over Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-x
